item.title: 2025 Indie Dev Frugal Stack: Money-Saving AI Coding + Zero-Cost Web Deploy (DeepSeek R1 0528, Gemini 2.5, Qwen3)
item.description: 2025 trends: DeepSeek R1 0528, Gemini 2.5, Qwen3 free/low-cost AI coding combos + zero-cost web deployment with Vercel/Cloudflare Pages/Workers — a practical playbook for indie developers.
